scotmaps 0.0.0.1
  • Basic use cases
  • Reference
  • github

Reference

All functions

add_license_header()

Add the boilerplate Apache header to the top of a source code file

available_layers()

List available data layers

community_councils()

Community Councils Boundaries

data_zone_2011()

Data Zone Boundaries 2011

delete_cache() show_cached_files()

View and delete cached files

fix_geo_problems()

Check and fix polygons that self-intersect, and sometimes can fix orphan holes

get_layer()

Get a scotmaps spatial layer

get_poly_attribute()

Get or calculate the attribute of a list-column containing nested dataframes.

local_authorities()

Scottish Local Authorities Boundaries

make_shortcuts()

Make shortcut functions for data objects in scotmaps from SpatialData.gov.scot

marine_areas()

Scottish Marine Area

raster_by_poly()

Overlay a SpatialPolygonsDataFrame or sf polygons layer on a raster layer and clip the raster to each polygon. Optionally done in parallel

scotmaps

scotmaps: A data package providing open licence map layers for Scotland

self_union()

Union a SpatialPolygons* object with itself to remove overlaps, while retaining attributes

summarize_raster_list()

Summarize a list of rasters into a list of numeric vectors

water_monitoring_sites()

Water monitoring sites

Contents
